body.name: ASUS ROG Strix XG27AQV 27" 16:9 WQHD 170Hz Curved IPS LED HDR Gaming Monitor, Black

asinVariationValues.variationValue: 27" Fast IPS QHD 270Hz G-SYNC EVA EDITION

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 19 mins
features: 27 inch QHD (2560 x 1440) curved monitor with ultrafast 170Hz (OC) refresh rate designed for professional gamers and immersive gameplay
Fast IPS technology enables a 1ms response time (GTG) for sharp gaming visuals with high frame rates.
G-SYNC Compatible in process and FreeSync Premium delivering a seamless, tear-free gaming experience by enabling VRR (variable refresh rate) by default.
High dynamic range (HDR) technology with DisplayHDR 400 compliance ensures exceptional contrast and color performance
Features an ergonomically designed stand to offer extensive swivel, tilt, pivot, and height adjustment
Rich connectivity with DisplayPort 1.2 and HDMI (v2.0) x2 ports
What’s in the Box: DisplayPort cable, HDMI cable, ROG pouch, Power cord & adapter, Quick start guide, Warranty Card
3-month Adobe Creative Cloud Subscription: Receive complimentary access with the purchase of this product (valid from 9/15/2021 to 8/31/2024)
body.description: Perfect for gaming and streaming, the ROG Strix XG27AQV curved HDR gaming monitor features Fast IPS, which improves response time without compromising image quality. The DisplayHDR™ 400 compliance ensures exceptional contrast and color performance, displaying the brightest whites and the darkest blacks to bring out details like never before.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Incredibly Fast 170Hz Refresh Rate You'll experience amazingly fluid gaming visuals, giving you the upper hand in first-person shooters, racing, real-time strategy, and sports titles. ASUS FastIPS Display: 1ms (GTG) Response Time ASUS Fast IPS Display allows the display’s liquid crystal elements to switch up to 4X faster than conventional IPS panels for improved response. With a 1ms gray-to-gray response time, smearing and motion blur are virtually eliminated. Wide 178-degree viewing angles ensure minimal distortion and color shift even when you're viewing from extreme positions. AMD FreeSync Premium Technology AMD FreeSync Premium Technology provides exceptional high dynamic range visuals while still maintaining low latency.

ASUS Variable Overdrive Variable Overdrive modes that dynamically adjust overdrive settings as frame rates fluctuate, eliminating ghosting for exceptionally smooth visuals. High Dynamic Range (HDR) with DISPLAYHDR 400 HDR technology supports across a range of luminance to deliver a wider color range and higher contrast than traditional monitors. The brightest whites and the darkest blacks bring out details like never before. Also, it can get a peak brightness of 400 nits to meet the requirement for DisplayHDR 400 certification. Multi HDR Mode Now you can choose from multiple HDR modes to adjust monitor HDR performance based on the current viewing scenario.

GamePlus The ASUS-exclusive, integrated GamePlus hotkey offers in-game enhancements that help you get more out of your game. This function is co-developed with input from pro gamers, allowing them to practice and improve their gaming skills. Ergonomic Design With an ergonomically-designed stand, it provides tilt, swivel, and height adjustments so you can easily find your ideal viewing position. The display is also VESA-compatible for wall mounting. Rich Connectivity Extensive connectivity options, including, I/O: DisplayPort1.2, two HDMI (v2.0) support a wide array of multimedia devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic monitor! Sleek, vibrant, and smooth.
reviews.reviewText: ASUS truly knows how to make a good monitor. After over 10 years using an older ASUS 1080p 60Hz 1ms-delay screen, I decided to upgrade to this one. It is a marvelous piece of tech at a decent price and I highly recommend. Numerous inputs, fairly easy switching between inputs, lots of clear options. My only complaint would be the build quality of the chassis, which feels a touch flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing functionality and easy setup
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this monitor. It is now my primary monitor with the old Predator monitor taking a sideline as a display. Not saying the Predator is bad (it is great on a budget), but this monitor just blew away my expectations and is just an upgrade all around. Sound quality is great, picture is amazing, lag is not an issue, the eye strain reduction is already noticeable after a few weeks. Packaging was very well done, shipped fast, great construction, easy for follow set up instructions, BEAUTIFUL design, and the backlight is just icing on the cake. I would highly recommend anyone looking to get a great start or upgrade from another monitor to get this one. Bonus-it just flat out looks amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is absolutely amazing!!! I looked thoroughly through reviews of many ultrawides and pulled the trigger. Got it used for like 200$ cheaper and in great condition. Colors are vibrant as hell and image clarity is perfect. Makes the graphics in game look crispier than my previous monitor odyssey g7 32 in. Although that was VA and this is IPS I will say contrast is lacking but to be expected and tbh I was regretting getting IPS and almost changed for a VA ultrawide but take some time and let your eyes get used to it and you will appreciate it for what it is trust me! This monitor is exceptional I'd say!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect monitor!?
reviews.reviewText: Anyone playing console playing fps games should absolutely buy this monitor!!! Color is amazing, resolution is perfect for the size. I play Apex Legends/ COD mostly and this is the perfect monitor. I used to play on a 4k 48” Sony OLED A9S and this is much better. I had such a hard time seeing things on the Sony. So much so this monitor is like getting lasik and HD vision. I no longer require sight attachments in games and can use iron sights to make hits. If you’re on the fence, just get one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great 1440P monitor but……
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent moniter worthy of 5 stars for my gaming (Battlefield 2042, city skylines, Space engineers). However, it does have bleed in when it comes to dark backgrounds on movies! I will note this has excellent color reproduction in my opinion with excellent contrast. I am not moniter and color geek but I am decently picky about colors!Side note this monitors whites… are SUPER WHITE Bright. Dark rooms beware! I have to use night light to turn it slightly yellow at night otherwise my poor eyeballs will burn.A 5/5 in my book for $370 after tax if I wanted to splurge I would go for the Samsung G7 27in 1440p to prevent the bleed in but I don’t mind it that much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ASUS ROG Strix 27” 1440P Curved Gaming Monitor (XG27AQV) - QHD (2560 x 1440)
reviews.reviewText: Delivered very quickly, without damage or dead pixels. Good image quality, the curved shape of the monitor allows you to take a fresh look at the picture. Simple and clear settings menu. I'm happy with the purchase, I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect white monitor for my ROG setup!!
reviews.reviewText: Let me start off by saying that when it arrived, I immediately noticed 1 dead/stuck pixel. Normally this would not be a huge deal, but this monitor isn’t cheap and it was very noticeable. Amazon did have me call Asus while they were on the phone with me. They said 3 pixel minimum to be considered defective. I was really upset and asked the Amazon worker what to do. Amazon worker was caring and said she was shipping me a new one and I just had to drop the other one off at ups store. The next one arrived the very next day and works perfect. Props to Amazon for taking care of this.The new monitor has zero dead pixels. I absolutely love it! It matches the rest of my white ROG setup perfectly. I don’t use the overclock feature, I keep it at 144. I run my games at the highest settings and it looks amazing on this thing.The “V” shaped mount is rather large and could get in the way if you have a smaller desk. The way you can raise and lower this thing just using two fingers is great! You can set it really low on the desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best ultra gaming monitor ever!
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded this 34" QHD monitor from a 27" FHD monitor, and once I did that, I will never go back to it.This monitor makes all the games to the next level. my specs i7-10700kf & RTX3080, it runs great. I was thinking about the Alienware OLED 34", but that monitor does the refreshes thing every 4 hours just killed it, I need something that can be running as long as I want. and this monitor came across, and I'm glad that I made this purchase!
Excelente monitor calidad precio solo un detalle la caja venia muy golpeada y maltratada con parches de cartón y con cinta pensé que iba a estar dañado el monitor.

Excelente monitor curvo IPS algo bastante complicado de encontrar ademas de contar con la tecnologia G-Sync para las tarjetas N-vidia.El tamaño es el adecuado para jugar es perfecto.Tiene uns construccion de calidad. Se siente muy bien desde el empaquetado ademas de contar con buena ergonomia permitiendo modificar la altura y los angulos y que se sienta firme el monitor.Tiene buenas calidad de color y cumple con la cantidad de FPS lo probe con los juegos mas actualces y luce muy bien.El unico detalle es el mismo que tienen todos los ips los negros no son negros y tiene algunas fugas de luz cuando el color es negro, algo esperable para un ips.Fuera de todo lo demas es un excelente monitor a un buen precio.
Excelente producto, cumple todo lo que dice, muy bien protegido y llego a tiempo. Ampliamente recomendado
the best of all the montitors

Quiero hacer una aclaracion para aquellos que tengan dudas sobre comprar este monitor.La primera impresion que quiero aclarar es que jamas habia tenido un monitor gamer arriba de 60 fps y no conocia los cables displayport y sus diferentes versiones 1.1, 1.2, 1.3 y 1.4 o 1.4a.Quiero señalar que tengo una rog strix rtx 3070ti y sus puertos dp son 1.4 nativos. Al conectar este monitor me hacia un parpadeo horrible y unicamente lo pude configurar despues de medio de dia de pruebas a 100 hz con la resolucion 3440 x 1444p y realmente no soportaba 120, 144 y ni mucho menos 180 hz. Realmente estaba frustrado, pero buscando y buscando considere la opcion que el cable que trae de fabrica podria ser version DP 1.1 o 1.2 o simplemente un cable chino de baja calidad con el logo de ROG. Para mi suerte me acaba de llegar un cable "UGREEN Displayport Cable 1.4, 8k DisplayPort a DisplayPort Cable Nylon trenzado DP a DP (8K @ 60Hz, 4K @ 144Hz y 1080P @ 240Hz) Soporte 32.4Gbps HDR H" de 2 mts que compre aqui en amazon y walaaaa, tengo la resolucion a tope y a 180 hz. Les comparto mi experiencia por si tienen la misma situacion que yo.Edit. El cable que trae este monitor trabaja a 120 hz con resolucion a 2048 x 1080. 144 hz ya no soporta y por ende si le subes la resolucion a 3440 x 1444p no te va dar mas que 100 hz. Tengan cuidado.
